recipesJson.name: ShartCake
recipesJson.author: DumHed
recipesJson.description: The perfect strawberry shortcake, ive tried to make hundreds, but they were always off. I borrowed very heavily from Mlnikon's strawberry pastry recipe. I had a long description but it got deleted, sorry not gonna make another. Ooo golden spongecake is VITAL, and so is VT sweet cream, it is unlike any other sweet cream.
